tr.name: Cypher
tr.appearance: Tall, imposing figure with glowing eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did Alex know, the game was about to become all too real.
json_to_edit.description: Alex gets trapped in a virtual world that becomes increasingly dangerous.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Digital hums, distant echoes, occasional glitches
json_to_edit.name: Virtual Entrapment
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex, an unsuspecting gamer, gets trapped in a virtual world created by Cypher, with Zara as a mysterious guide.

qa.action: Alex puts on a VR headset and is suddenly transported to a vast, futuristic cityscape.

hf.action: Alex looks around in awe, touching holographic interfaces floating in the air.

tr.action: Alex's eyes widen in shock as he realizes he can't remove the VR headset.

xc.action: Zara appears beside Alex, her holographic form flickering slightly.

ka.action: The cityscape begins to glitch and warp, revealing a more sinister environment.

fn.action: Cypher's glowing eyes appear in the sky, watching Alex and Zara with malicious intent.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Little did Alex know, the game was about to become all too real.
updated_json.description: Alex gets trapped in a virtual world that becomes increasingly dangerous.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Digital hums, distant echoes, occasional glitches
updated_json.name: Virtual Entrapment
updated_json.scene_summary: Alex, an unsuspecting gamer, gets trapped in a virtual world created by Cypher, with Zara as a mysterious guide.

qa.action: Alex puts on a VR headset and is suddenly transported to a vast, futuristic cityscape.

tr.action: Alex's eyes widen in shock as he realizes he can't remove the VR headset.

ka.action: The cityscape begins to glitch and warp, revealing a more sinister environment.

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", and "fn", which correspond to the second, fourth, and sixth shots in the original order. we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and remove these shots from the "shots" dictionary. the number of shots will be reduced from 6 to 3, so we'll update that as well. all other elements of the scene, including the voice over, description, location, lighting, weather, ambience sound keywords, name, and scene summary will remain the same.
